world.physics: Objects begin in motion and adhere to curved trajectories based on their behaviors. Emissions from the player collide in a straightforward linear path.
world.visualStyle: Enchanted and mystical forest, filled with glowing plants and delicate sprites. Colors are a mix of deep greens blended with luminescent shades.
world.worldDescripiton: A serene forest clearing bathed in soft golden light, with gently waving luminescent plants and subtle sparkling particles dancing in the air.

player.render: An elegant forest elf with intricate glowing patterns on their leafy outfit. Their magic pouch of seeds hovers slightly above their waist like a mystical artifact.

emissions.render: A glowing green seed with a sparkling halo, it shimmers mid-air as if imbued with a pulsing life essence.

objects.name: Forest Bloom Spot
objects.behavior: It stays static, represented as a patch of rich earth with soft glowing green emanating from it.
objects.interactionDescription: When the seed collides, the patch erupts in vibrant flowers blooming into life.

objects.name: Mischievous Sprite
objects.behavior: Flies in erratic circular patterns, occasionally darting randomly. It glows faintly bluish-white and leaves a trail of sparkles.
objects.interactionDescription: Causes the seed to miss its target, teasing the player with a giggle before darting away.

possibleNext.change: Sprout new trees to ward dangers
